name: DigiForce SDK
short_description: DigiForce is a SDK for Unix/Linux/Windows with : Window(DX,GDI,X11,OpenGL), Bitmap(PNG,GIF,BMP,JPG,ICO), Sound(WAV,MP3), Video(AVI/DivX/VFW), multi-Threading, Network(IP), Servers(HTTP(IPP), FTP, SMTP, POP3, DHCP, DNS), OpenSSL, etc.
